game.name: Ice Cream Maker
game.description:
Welcome to the world full of sweets!! This awesome land will allow you to run your own candy shop where you will have to play the role of an expert cake and ice cream maker. Hope you will have a great fun while joining this brand new cooking game – “Ice Cream Maker”! Whether you are a layman or an experienced game – this cool free online game has something to keep everyone engrossed for hours. Let’s try it together and know why gamers from across the world are checking it out during their spare time!

It’s a wonderful sunny day and all people are now looking for some refreshments and delicious ice cream to overcome the heat spreading around during the hot day of summer. Luckily, you have their own popular ice cream shop at the middle of the town where people visit quite often. As a response, horde of people is coming to your shop in a search for the scrumptious ice creams and drinks. Join this one of the best girls games and get ready to help the character to prepare and serve some highly delicious desserts to your customers!

We know that you have ultimate cooking skills, so don’t waste it anymore. Get ready to fulfil the desires of your customers as fast as you can since most of them are impatient! Drag the ingredients on to the tray to prepare each order. Once it’s done, serve it to your customers timely. Make sure to choose the appropriate type of ice cream flavour and type of drink from plenty of options that are shown at the disposal. Try to happy as much as customers to earn good points in this cool ice cream management game! Explore more free online games for girls and learn new recipes in our virtual kitchen!!
